title: If you were in Pete best’s place, what would you have done after being hired of The Beatles without any explanation? Would you had it out with them or just carried away with? - Quora

response.answer_text: Essentially carry on which he did and he could have joined another band and be successful he was a good drummer just not right for the Beatles brand Ringo was a better fit . However Pete could have written a book,made tv appearances there's plenty documentaries and films about his period though he ironically ended up working as a taxman. Happy ending because he deported himself with grace he made money off the anthology and other recordings he played on ,hard not to feel for him though the Beatles made the right choice as a drummer and a personality Ringos a class act.
